config.dynamic_fps.idle_time_tooltip: Minutes without input until Dynamic FPS activates the Idle state while the game is focused.
config.dynamic_fps.show_toasts_tooltip: Whether to keep displaying or delay toast notifications
config.dynamic_fps.uncap_menu_frame_rate: Remove the 60 FPS limit in the main menu.
config.dynamic_fps.graphics_state_minima: Minimal graphics cause the world to reload!
config.dynamic_fps.run_garbage_collector: Free up unused memory when switching to this status
